The Consumer Technology Association Announces CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honorees
The Consumer Technology Association (CTA)® today announced itsâ€¯CES® 2024 Innovation Awards honorees – including 36 products recognized as the year’s ‘Best of Innovation.’ The CES Innovation Awards is an annual competition honoring outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology products across 29 product categories. The program was ALL ON for CES 2024, receiving more than 3000 submissions, a record high and a 40% increase over CES 2023.
Each year, an independent panel of industry expert judges, including members of the media, designers and engineers, reviews and rates submissions based on innovation, functionality, aesthetic, and design. Those rated the highest across all categories receive the Best of Innovation designation.
For the CES 2024 program, the top two categories by number of submissions were ‘digital health’ and ‘sustainability, eco-design & smart energy.’ This trend underscores the rapid pace of innovation in sectors that promise to solve big global challenges and improve human lives – a major theme at the show as CTA partners with the UN Trust Fund for Human Security and World Academy of Art and Science (WAAS) to advance human security. For the first time, the Best of Innovation list for CES 2024 includes a product from the ‘Human Security’ category, introduced at CES 2023.
The CES 2024 Innovation Awards also features a new category – artificial intelligence (AI). The AI category received 7% of all applications, underscoring that innovators are increasingly recognizing the transformative potential of AI in shaping the future of technology. AI will also be pervasive throughout the CES 2024 show floor and conference programming.
The full Best of Innovation list and all 522 Innovation Award honorees will be announced during CES 2024, where many of the products will appear in the Innovation Awards Showcase at CES, located in the Venetian Expo.
The Best of Innovation honorees for 2024 include:
AirFarm

Owned and produced by CTA, CES 2024 will take place in Las Vegas on Jan. 9-12, 2024 with Media Days taking place Jan. 7-8, 2024.â€¯Attendees will experience new technologies from global brands, hear about the future of technology from thought leaders and collaborate face-to-face with other attendees. The show will highlight how innovations in sustainability, transportation and mobility, AI, digital health and more are addressing the world’s greatest challenges. Audiences will hear from industry experts during live keynotes, including leaders from L’Oreal, Walmart, Nasdaq, Siemens and Qualcomm.â€¯Visitâ€¯CES.techâ€¯for all CES 2023 updates,â€¯registration details, and theâ€¯media pageâ€¯for all press resources.
About CES:â€¯
CES® is the most powerful tech event in the world – the proving ground for breakthrough technologies and global innovators. This is where the world's biggest brands do business and meet new partners, and the sharpest innovators hit the stage. Owned and produced by the Consumer Technology Association (CTA)®, CES features every aspect of the tech sector. CES 2024 will take place in person in Las Vegas, and digitally, Jan. 9-12, 2024. Learn more atâ€¯CES.techâ€¯and follow CES onâ€¯social.â€¯â€¯
About Consumer Technology Association:â€¯
As North America’s largest technology trade association, CTA®â€¯isâ€¯the tech sector. Our members are the world’s leading innovators – from startups to global brands – helping support more than 18 million American jobs. CTA owns and produces CES® – the most influential tech event in the world. Find us atâ€¯CTA.tech. Follow usâ€¯@CTAtech.â€¯

News
VanJee Technology debuts CES with a full range of LiDAR, integrating into global scientific and technological innovation.
Jan 11,2023
On January 5th, VanJee Technology showed up at CES 2023 in the United States, the world's largest consumer electronics exhibition. This is VanJee’s first overseas exhibition this year, bringing a variety of LiDAR production in the vehicle, road side, and industrial fields. In terms of vehicle LiDAR, VanJee Technology exhibited the fusion solutions of 128-layer main LiDAR+Pure solid state blind spot OPA-LiDAR. Among them, WLR-739 128-layer main LiDAR is officially promoted to international vehicle manufacturers after the release of domestic products.
With new masterpieces, VanJee Technology shows technical confidence in on -site interaction.
At the booth site, VanJee Technology established a set of 128 -line laser radar interactive experience zone. It simulates vehicles for real -time detection of past pedestrians, and shows the point cloud interface. Visitors can directly feel the 128 -layer LiDAR’s super long -range detection capabilities, densely scanning accuracy, and excellent anti -interference capabilities. It shows the global public display, which fully reflects the high confidence of VanJee Technology's dedication and performance. During this period, it received the key attention and affirmation of professional customers, technical experts, and industry media.
VanJee Vehicle LiDAR WLR-739 uses 905nm light source. It has an angular resolution of 0.1 °*0.2 °, which exceeds 150W per second to meet the high -precision detection requirements. The detection distance of 10%standard reflectance can reach 150 meters and the farthest detection distance can reach 200 meters. It meets the requirements of high -speed targets in high -speed scene detection of ultra -long -distance targets, leaving sufficient reaction time for ADAS to ensure driving safety.
In the past three years, through the in -depth layout of automotive electronic products, VanJee Technology has become a first -level supplier of more than 60 main vehicle manufacturers in the world. With much joint development experience in terms of LiDAR product development system, VanJee runs through the product design, R & D, testing, production, and process full process, and the full -chain -to -vehicle regulations for quality standards to meet the market's performance and stability of LiDAR requirements. Regarding the global promotion of WLR-739, VanJee Technology will first provide LiDAR trials and tests to long-term cooperative companies.
In terms of delivery guarantee, VanJee Technology has a global manufacturing base of more than 42,000 square meters. Among them, the inspection center passed CNAS certification in 2017, covering the field of automotive electronics and other fields. It has more than hundreds of testing projects. At present, WLR-739 has completed the related tests of DV experiments. The manufacturing base is also equipped with a 10,000 -level dust -free workshop and an advanced automated production line. The annual production capacity of the vehicle LiDAR is 300,000 units.
Empower industrial automation and light up the new ecology
VanJee Technology has more than 10 years of LiDAR product development experience. The products are widely used in smart transportation and industrial service, robot navigation obstacle avoidance and driving scenarios.
Among them, 716 mini is a SLAM navigation lidar, which takes into account the dual advantage of high accuracy and small volume. Its accuracy of 20mm, 25M ranging capacity, is suitable for navigation of industrial logistics robots such as cleaning and disinfecting commercial service robots and AGV.
718mini is an obstacle -free lidar that can provide a 270 ° scanning angle and a 25 -meter protection distance. It can provide reliable anti -collision support for mobile devices such as AGV/ AMR/ laser forklift and heavy port machines.
In this exhibition, VanJee Technology and LiDAR's full series of products have received widespread attention and recognition from the international market relying on rich practical experience and forward -looking layouts. It shows the global hardcore product power, showing the company's technical self -confidence Essence In the future. VanJee Technology will continue to inject new impetus into the development of the laser radar industry, technological innovation, and expanding application scenarios, enhance the degree of industrial automation, and help the development of the autonomous driving industry.

About us
VanJee Technology is a world leading Intelligent Transport System (ITS)
company headquater in Beijing as well as a publicly traded company in Shenzhen Stock Exchange. (SZSE).
VanJee is proud to provide four prominent ITS products: 1. Weigh-In-Motion, 2. Electronic Toll Collection (ETC), 3. LiDAR, 4. V2X. Additionally, VanJee is a publicly traded company at Shenzhen Stock Exchange (SHE:300552).
Our mission is to protect road asset worldwide, guarantee traffic safety and improve traffic efficiency.

LiDAR
VanJee LiDAR has highest reliability, accuracy and adaptability which provides valuable data for traffic service as well as autonomous driving on vehicle. Until 2020, VanJee has supplied more than 10,000 LiDARs worldwide including China, Saudi Arabia, Poland, Hungary, Brazil and Japan. VanJee LiDAR has high point density and smaller divergence to achieve better digital image quality.
V2X
VanJee V2X system has comprehensive functions of storing, calculating, transmitting and relaying road
information in real-time. VanJee V2X chooses advanced sensors and multi-access edge computing (MEC) to realize information sharing in "People, Vehicles, Roads and Cloud Platforms" efficiently. VanJee V2X reduces the delay of port data transmission and mass data backhaul significantly to relieve the pressure of computing and storing information for on-board terminals and roadside equipment. Therefore, VanJee V2X can provide high quality localized road information service and optimize the road traffic system high-efficiency.
ETC
VanJee has supplied more than 1,2000 ETC multi-lane free flow (MLFF) gantries in highway system which integrates RSU antenna, LiDAR and ANPR cameras. VanJee develops RSU to make transaction with OBU by using DSRC 5.8GHz.
WEIGH IN MOTION (WIM)
VanJee successfully launched the first WIM Direct Enforcement System in Asia. With 27 years WIM experience, VanJee has supplied more than 300 WIM Direct Enforcement sites and distributed 16 thousand WIM equipment as well as has obtained more than 100 intellectual property rights in WIM area.
AUTOMOTIVE ELECTRONICS
VanJee has been developing automotive electronics products base on automobile
standard including V2X OBU, 3D-LiDAR, Preinstalled OBU and cockpit. VanJee would
empower vehicles to achieve automous driving by V2X and 3D-LiDAR.
VanJee Technology
VanJee Technology focuses on Intelligent Transport System (ITS) which includes traffic products and highly sophisticated and tailormade traffic solution.

Development History
1994
VanJee was founded
1996
VanJee Finished First WIM POCVanJee implemented WIM national widely in 1998,which is the very first overload test enforcement.
1999
VanJee intended to become a national-level company and set up branches in SHCQ and GZ in the same year.
2006

2008
VanJee started ETC business. VanJee finished first MLFF in Wuhan 2010.
2012
VanJee started LiDAR business.
2014
VanJee manufacturing base started production.
VanJee passed TS16949 Certification
2016
VanJee went to Public in Shenzhen Stock Exchange (SZSE:300552).
2017
VanJee moved headquarters in VanJee Space, Zpark (known as Chinese Silicon Valley).
VanJee setup Global IBD team.
2019
VanJee undertook a unprecedented expressway reform in China which upgrade most Toll Plazas to MLFF. VanJee supplied more than 1,2000 MLFF gantries.
